name: Matrix.mem_unitaryGroup_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Matrix n n α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) A) (Eq (HMul.hMul A (Star.star A)) 1)
decl:
theorem mem_unitaryGroup_iff : A ∈ Matrix.unitaryGroup n α ↔ A * star A = 1 := by
  refine ⟨And.right, fun hA => ⟨?_, hA⟩⟩
  simpa only [mul_eq_one_comm] using hA

name: Matrix.mem_unitaryGroup_iff'
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Matrix n n α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) A) (Eq (HMul.hMul (Star.star A) A) 1)
decl:
theorem mem_unitaryGroup_iff' : A ∈ Matrix.unitaryGroup n α ↔ star A * A = 1 := by
  refine ⟨And.left, fun hA => ⟨hA, ?_⟩⟩
  rwa [mul_eq_one_comm] at hA

name: Matrix.det_of_mem_unitary
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Matrix n n α
hA : Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) A
⊢ Membership.mem (unitary α) A.det
decl:
theorem det_of_mem_unitary {A : Matrix n n α} (hA : A ∈ Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) :
    A.det ∈ unitary α := by
  constructor
  · simpa [star, det_transpose] using congr_arg det hA.1
  · simpa [star, det_transpose] using congr_arg det hA.2

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.ext_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Iff (Eq A B) (∀ (i j : n), Eq (↑A i j) (↑B i j))
decl:
theorem ext_iff (A B : unitaryGroup n α) : A = B ↔ ∀ i j, A i j = B i j :=
  Subtype.ext_iff_val.trans ⟨fun h i j => congr_fun (congr_fun h i) j, Matrix.ext⟩

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.ext
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
a✝ : ∀ (i j : n), Eq (↑A i j) (↑B i j)
⊢ Eq A B
decl:
@[ext]
theorem ext (A B : unitaryGroup n α) : (∀ i j, A i j = B i j) → A = B :=
  (UnitaryGroup.ext_iff A B).mpr

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.star_mul_self
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (Star.star ↑A) ↑A) 1
decl:
theorem star_mul_self (A : unitaryGroup n α) : star A.1 * A.1 = 1 :=
  A.2.1

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.det_isUnit
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ IsUnit (↑A).det
decl:
@[simp]
theorem det_isUnit (A : unitaryGroup n α) : IsUnit (A : Matrix n n α).det :=
  isUnit_iff_isUnit_det _ |>.mp <| (unitary.toUnits A).isUnit

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.inv_val
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv A)) (Star.star ↑A)
decl: @[simp] theorem inv_val : ↑A⁻¹ = (star A : Matrix n n α) := rfl

inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv A)) (Star.star ↑A)
decl: @[simp] theorem inv_apply : ⇑A⁻¹ = (star A : Matrix n n α) := rfl

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.mul_val

n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (↑(HMul.hMul A B)) (HMul.hMul ↑A ↑B)
decl: @[simp] theorem mul_val : ↑(A * B) = A.1 * B.1 := rfl

α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (↑(HMul.hMul A B)) (HMul.hMul ↑A ↑B)
decl: @[simp] theorem mul_apply : ⇑(A * B) = A.1 * B.1 := rfl

inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
⊢ Eq (↑1) 1
decl: @[simp] theorem one_val : ↑(1 : unitaryGroup n α) = (1 : Matrix n n α) := rfl

initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n

inst✝ : StarRing α
⊢ Eq (↑1) 1
decl: @[simp] theorem one_apply : ⇑(1 : unitaryGroup n α) = (1 : Matrix n n α) := rfl

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin'_mul
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin' (HMul.hMul A B)) ((Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin' A).comp (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin' B))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toLin'_mul : toLin' (A * B) = (toLin' A).comp (toLin' B) :=
  Matrix.toLin'_mul A.1 B.1

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin'_one
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
⊢ Eq (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin' 1) LinearMap.id
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toLin'_one : toLin' (1 : unitaryGroup n α) = LinearMap.id :=
  Matrix.toLin'_one

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.coe_toGL
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (↑(Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL A)) (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toLin' A)
decl: theorem coe_toGL (A : unitaryGroup n α) : (toGL A).1 = toLin' A := rfl

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL_one
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
⊢ Eq (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL 1) 1
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toGL_one : toGL (1 : unitaryGroup n α) = 1 := Units.ext <| by
  simp only [coe_toGL, toLin'_one]
  rfl

name: Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL_mul
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A B : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) x
⊢ Eq (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL (HMul.hMul A B)) (HMul.hMul (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL A) (Matrix.UnitaryGroup.toGL B))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toGL_mul (A B : unitaryGroup n α) : toGL (A * B) = toGL A * toGL B := Units.ext <| by
  simp only [coe_toGL, toLin'_mul]
  rfl

name: Matrix.mem_specialUnitaryGroup_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
α : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing α
inst✝ : StarRing α
A : Matrix n n α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.specialUnitaryGroup n α) A) (And (Membership.mem (Matrix.unitaryGroup n α) A) (Eq A.det 1))
decl:
theorem mem_specialUnitaryGroup_iff :
    A ∈ specialUnitaryGroup n α ↔ A ∈ unitaryGroup n α ∧ A.det = 1 :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Matrix.mem_orthogonalGroup_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
β : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing β
A : Matrix n n β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.orthogonalGroup n β) A) (Eq (HMul.hMul A (Star.star A)) 1)
decl:
theorem mem_orthogonalGroup_iff {A : Matrix n n β} :
    A ∈ Matrix.orthogonalGroup n β ↔ A * star A = 1 := by
  refine ⟨And.right, fun hA => ⟨?_, hA⟩⟩
  simpa only [mul_eq_one_comm] using hA

name: Matrix.mem_orthogonalGroup_iff'
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
β : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing β
A : Matrix n n β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.orthogonalGroup n β) A) (Eq (HMul.hMul (Star.star A) A) 1)
decl:
theorem mem_orthogonalGroup_iff' {A : Matrix n n β} :
    A ∈ Matrix.orthogonalGroup n β ↔ star A * A = 1 := by
  refine ⟨And.left, fun hA => ⟨hA, ?_⟩⟩
  rwa [mul_eq_one_comm] at hA

name: Matrix.mem_specialOrthogonalGroup_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
β : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing β
A : Matrix n n β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.specialOrthogonalGroup n β) A) (And (Membership.mem (Matrix.orthogonalGroup n β) A) (Eq A.det 1))
decl:
theorem mem_specialOrthogonalGroup_iff :
    A ∈ specialOrthogonalGroup n β ↔ A ∈ orthogonalGroup n β ∧ A.det = 1 :=
  Iff.rfl
